entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local smoke. High 27. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 11. POP 30%
